features: ADORABLE SHARKS BIBS FOR KIDS - Let the feeding frenzy begin. Keeping clothes clean is easier than ever with disposable bibs for kids
3 LAYERS OF PROTECTION - Quilted, absorbent, and leak-proof layers protect clothes when your kids are twirling spaghetti like Peppa Pig or even for making craft time messes
CRUMB CATCHER INCLUDED - Crumb catcher pocket and absorbent material keeps babies clean and dry
PERFECT FOR TRAVEL AND MEALS ON THE GO - Light and compact disposable bibs for families on the go. Keep them in your bag or car to always have messy mealtime in check

30 DISPOSABLE PAPER BIBS TO A PACK - 30 paper bibs in this pack means your little one will be good and set for all occasions. Use them for everything from everyday tabletop to shark-themed birthday party supplies
body.description: Take a break from clean-up with our disposable shark-print paper bibs for tiny, ravenous humans. At Glad for Kids, we're on a mission to make even the pickiest eater smile by dressing up mealtimes with kid-friendly patterns like these fun sharks, while making clean up more convenient than ever for busy parents. These cute paper bibs feature a cute shark pattern in blue, orange, and green. Use them to keep messy eaters clean during breakfast, lunch, dinner, dessert, or snacks. Disposable paper bibs from Glad for Kids are great for everyday meals or meals on the go. There's even a crumb catcher pocket at the bottom of each bib, and an adhesive tab on the back to affix the bib to clothing to keep everything in its place. With three layers of protection, these bibs for kids will keep clothes clean, even if their meal gets messy. Quilted, absorbent, and leak-proof layers can protect clothes at mealtimes or craft time, too. Use them at themed parties, play dates, or a rainy afternoon of finger painting. When the fun is over, clean up is a cinch. Simply toss and go! With 30 to a pack, parents can keep these light and compact disposable bibs in your kitchen, craft room, bag, or car to be prepared anytime, anywhere! These paper bibs for kids are fun for everyone, but especially for your littlest ravenous baby sharks who make big messes. How to use: 1. Once the bib is unfolded, turn the crumb catcher inside out 2. Tear at perforation and peel off the adhesive tabs 3. Adjust to fit and fasten behind neck. 4. Back adhesive affixes to clothing for a secure fit Be sure to check out all of our fun designs and products to make mealtime convenient and fun. Whether you're having a rainbow unicorn tea party or simply trying to inspire some dino-sized bites at the dinner table, at Glad for Kids, we believe in bringing a little magic to the mundane with fun sharks, dinos, unicorns and more patterns in tabletop products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It's better than all good, it's all Glad Glad is all about quality. We deliver durable, reliable products intended for everyday use. Glad always looks for new ways to boost standards and provide customers with the latest, greatest, and longest lasting choices. Safe for the whole family, Glad is committed to durability, dependability, and sustainability. Glad for Kids Disposable Paper Plates, Cups, Bowls with Lids, Food Storage, and Bibs For everyday and every occasion Shark sighted today! Don't worry, these sharks are here to help, not harm! Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks are more fun than ever with shark-themed, kid-friendly designs. With a variety of sturdy disposable plates, cups, straws and snack bowls, along with tight-sealing food storage and mess-preventing paper bibs, Glad for Kids has everything families need for fun and convenient meals. Plates Bowls Snack Bowls GladWare Bibs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves the Peppa Pig print, these are very absorbent and has a pocket to catch crumbs. My only complaint would be the adhesive to attach to child, you have to remove a plastic tab which is fine but other brands I’ve used is more of a Velcro which I find to be easier and faster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On the go bibs
reviews.reviewText: Perfect and easy to use on the go travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for traveling
reviews.reviewText: We travel often with our baby and this has been life changing for us! Makes everything so easy and mess free. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy for on the go
reviews.reviewText: These are super helpful and easy to put on. They also have a little food catcher which is great. Only downside is that they are not super adhesive and very much removable if you have grabby hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wanted them for when we went out to eat. Light weight material with adhesives on the inside for the option to stick on to your kids clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality product.
reviews.reviewText: Great for in a pinch. Would maybe be better for a little older child. My 8 month old grandson kept pulling on it and it did not stay attached and kept falling down. Great quality and a good closure unless strongly pulling on it. Will try again. Maybe I didn’t close it like it should have been. Need to read the box which wasn’t with us. Great quality product otherwise. Very sturdy and took food, drool, etc. we’ll!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It’s soft and light. Baby likes it

Los utilizamos para un viaje de dos semanas y funcionaron perfectamente.No ocupan mucho espacio y son de buena calidad. Tienen pegamento para unirlo atrás con muy buen agarre, pero también para pegarlo a la ropa y evitar que se mueva.No creo que sea para uso diario porque al final se genera más basura, pero son excelentes para viajes o alguna salida de emergencia cuando no tengas a la mano los baberos de siempre.

Compre estos porque no estaban disponibles los que normalmente pido, estos estan lindos pero el adherible no se pega para nada y la marca donde dice que debe pegar le queda enorme a mi bebe entonces tengo que hacerle un nudo para qie no se caiga
